name: Squirrel Wizard's Adventure
description:
Follow the journey of Squirrel Wizard as they travel back through the forest to their home! A small casual puzzle platformer based around throwing acorns onto switches to progress. With a paper splash art style and light hearted themes.

Default controls:
A, D = Move Left/Right
W, SpaceBar = Jump
Left Mouse = Throw Acorn

Made in a short period of time for a little discord event, there are a couple of improvements I look to possibly add in the future to expand it, including content and mechanics(air fans, moving platforms), however have nothing planned for definite at the current time.


Known issues:

  • Sticking to walls when walking into them (no raycast check)
  • No landing sound
  • No pause menu mid game
  • Colliding with acorns on pickup
